summary: An ordinance providing for the laying off, opening, widening, extending and establishing of Smith Street from the westerly line of Tract 1, Hunter's Lake Union Addition, to Glen Ridge Drive; of Wheeler Street from the westerly line of Tract 2, Hunter's Lake Union Addition to Glen Ridge Drive; of McGraw Street from the westerly line of Tract 3, Hunter's Lake Union Addition to Taylor Avenue; providing for the condemnation, appropriation, taking and damaging of land and other property necessary therefor; providing that the cost of said improvement shall be paid by special assessment upon the property specially benefited in the manner provided by law.
